Name: Dan
Title: Elefriend - The Best Experience
Review: This was a wonderful experience, highly recommend. The caretakers are very knowledgeable about the elephants and you can tell they have genuine friendships with them. The tour was excellent and we got some incredible photos. We had the guided tour on elephant back  but there are other activities too. Would recommend to anyone wanting the best elephant experience in Jaipur! Thank you so much!

Name: Shakeer K
Review: Our experience with the elephant at Elefriend was fabulous. The staff are extremely courteous, knowledgeable and trustworthy. They are respectful of your time and ensure you are comfortable.We got to touch and hug Babu, the elephant, feed him, walk him, ride on him bareback, paint his side with organic colours. Our 3 year old son was super excited and encouraged to get familiar with Babu. We had an experience which was so fulfilling and beautiful. This place is a must visit if you are in Jaipur!

Very nice experience! We read some awful reviews in other farms so we were hesitant to come. We don’t regret it! We started by feeding the elephant, so we became more at ease with her. Then we painted her a little with natural dye which was very nice. After one hour of interacting with her and speaking with her caregiver, we finally were ready to go for a ride. We did not take a box, we road on her back. It was more genuine. We learned that the guide lives with the elephants and his family at the village. Our guide had lived with her for 15 years! So they seem very well cared for. There are many farms in the same village. we were lucky to find this particular one, which was a great experience. Not cheap, but these animals are worth it, you can always ask for a discount ;) . There will be a photographer selling you printed fotos. You can always say no. The guide took really nice ones with our phone.

Name: Sandra B
Review: What a sweet experience! We purchase a combo package to play with the elephant. We were able to play freely with the elephant ask plenty of questions, feed, and touch the elephant. Then we rode the elephant for a while and after actually paint her. After our painting session we bathe her which was such a cute experience. Getting wet and scrubbing her was fun. You clearly can see the elephants the family owns are Well taken care of, feed properly, and they look so happy. I definitely recommend this location to play with the elephants.

Review: We spend an amazing time at elefriend the team is very friendly hospitality is no. 1 we spend around a day with an elephant Rani and Shabbo it was fantastic shoring with elephants was most amazing the time we spend it was worth of money and worth of time the owner kabeer is very friendly and the staff was amazing team if you are in Jaipur the place is highly recommended but please don't forget shoring with elephants and a lovely hug for Rani and Shabbo will visit again for sure very soon Thankyou everyone in the team.
